name: blood-bank-management-system
description: A comprehensive blood bank management system for hospitals and blood banks

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run copy-build
scripts.copy-build: mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ || (if not exist backend\public mkdir backend\public && xcopy frontend\dist\* backend\public\ /E /Y /Q)
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
